title: HPâ€™s new Spectre x360 13.5 is completely redesigned
content:
If you’re shopping for a new, premium laptop, it’s the day you’ve been waiting for. While Dell has its new XPS 13 Plus and Lenovo has a fancy new Yoga 9i, HP has yet to announce a new Spectre x360, until today. The company did a whole spring consumer PC launch today, and aside from

The post HP’s new Spectre x360 13.5 is completely redesigned appeared first on XDA.
description: HP is announcing all-new consumer PCs today, including a brand-new Spectre x360 13.5, along with new Envy convertibles and laptops.
